duplicates.evidence: Identical fix scope: 'fix(doctor): skip config permission warning for symlinks'. Same author (WeatherPal-AI), same category (commands), created 16 minutes apart (11368 at 19:06:34, 11382 at 19:22:29 on 2026-02-07). PR #11382 likely resubmission of #11368 with updated author history metadata (2→12 prior PRs), suggesting rejection/rework cycle. Titles and scope are verbatim identical. Second submission reflects additional contribution history accumulated between attempts.

Both PRs address identical cron timer spin loop issue with nearly identical titles: #16878 'fix(cron): prevent timer spin loop with minimum delay floor' vs #16946 'fix(cron): add minimum delay floor to prevent timer spin loop'. Same category, same size (XS), same change type (fix). Created 2 days apart (2026-02-15 08:16:56 vs 2026-02-15 06:20:37), suggesting #16946 by mudrii is superior revision/superseding submission compared to #16878 by Limitless2023 (mudrii has 33.3% merge rate vs Limitless2023's 25%, and appears to be deliberate revision). High confidence these are duplicate attempts at same fix.

Both PRs from same author (divol89) with 0% merge history, both fix-type changes in agents category, created within 26 minutes of each other (2026-02-05 15:28 vs 15:54). PR #9711 adds cli/web-ui/signal components to #9687 base. Possible revision/supersession pattern, though PR #9711 appears to be separate issue (#9649 vs #9683). Timing and author suggest possible parallel fix attempts or incremental refinement. Confidence reduced due to distinct issue references.

Both PRs address identical issue: CWD handling when working directory doesn't exist on node-host. PR #15453 author arosstale adds fallback to $HOME; PR #15454 author andrewdamelio adds error clearing logic. Same component (node-host), same timing (2 minutes apart on 2026-02-13), same XS size label, same fix classification. PR #15453 was created first (13:22:05); PR #15454 immediately follows (13:25:18). Likely redundant implementations of same fix, with #15454 possibly superseding or duplicating #15453. High confidence these address same underlying issue from different authors attempting simultaneous fix.

Same author (davidrudduck), sequential timestamps (2 minutes apart, 05:56:08 vs 05:56:18), both security-focused infrastructure fixes (loopback bind + error sanitization), both multi-category (gateway, agents), both from 0% merge-history author with 5-6 prior PRs. Likely related sequential attempts addressing different aspects of same security hardening initiative. High likelihood of intentional complementary PRs or deliberate resubmission strategy.

Both PRs submitted by first-time contributors within 11 minutes of each other (15424 @12:31:33, 15428 @12:44:45 on 2026-02-13). Both feature documentation/setup changes touching multiple high-priority components (web-ui, gateway, agents). Both missing critical metadata (LoC, files_changed, tests, CI status). Both contain large scope labels (L and XL). However, different authors (supmo668 vs linfangw), different change types (feature/tracking vs docs/settings), and different component combinations suggest these may be independent but thematically related contributions rather than duplicates. Moderate confidence reflects structural similarity and temporal proximity but distinct authorship and technical scope.
